title: holybirman.org
author: holybirman.org
content: While industry is exploiting the planet and civilization is destroying the livelihoods of most living beings, it must be the mission of humanity to gradually improve the living conditions of our fellow inhabitants in order to restore a balance between humans and all the other numerous species on our planet.We are at the top of the food chain. This obliges us to preserve biodiversity by all means by protecting endangered species and rebuilding destroyed habitats.Holybirman.org is an initiative to facilitate the global exchange of funds to provide support for animal shelters, environmental organizations and anyone who contributes to save the planet - without misappropriating funds.Recipients of donations undergo a investigation to be authenticated as legitimate partners, which minimizes the risk of funds getting lost due to selfish behavior. Beyond that, we are working on a platform to provide every HOLY user the possibility to donate to individual organizations within our verified recipients portfolio and to provide new homes for animals.Thank you for joining us in making the world a better place with less suffering and disbalance!Project InformationsHomepage: https://holybirman.org/Telegram: https://t.me/holybirman_orgTwitter: https://twitter.com/holybirmanorgToken Address: 0xae5c084ca12dc83c09921a641bbdee9f9c7808d6BscScan: https://bscscan.com/token/0xae5c084ca12dc83c09921a641bbdee9f9c7808d6DexScreener: https://dexscreener.com/bsc/0x1c3bd75d6949da615d9946f46065c3d28675aec8
